summary:
Education, development cooperation, internationalisation of higher education and research, capacity development, developing countries are key elements in my professional background. My engagement in education encompasses university education, Technical Vocational Education and Training (TVET), and secondary education.

I am a result-driven education specialist with a wealth of experience in the built-up and strengthening of  post secondary education and training and research sectors in developing countries. I am also conversant with internationalisation initiatives to improve quality of higher education and research in the developed world.

I am very familiar with institutional cooperation programmes and fellowships programmes. 
In my duties of responsible manager and administrator- on behalf of the Dutch government- of cooperation schemes in post secondary education and training, I contributed to policy development, programmes and projects design and implementation, monitoring and evaluation. These processes require strong interactions with governments, bilateral and multi-lateral donors.

I fulfilled several positions including secondary school teacher, project officer, country programmes manager, team manager, policy advisor, policy and research officer. 

Holder of two Master in Geography  and a teaching grade as well, I have good command of the following four languages: Dutch, English, French, and Mooré (mother tongue)

[{'company': {'id': 42935257, 'name': 'Nikièma Consults', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFpvrgEF1TQAQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1585822689493?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=LG1zaFZEDKsqqFxSTFSPfkoS3EjUs2CjWGqSwJ1WAz4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/niki%C3%A8ma-consults/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Voorschoten, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Nikièma Consults', 'description': 'I am the director and founder of Nikièma Consults a consultancy firm in the field of education and training. The aims of Nikièma Consults is to help actors in improving the overall performance of this sector that is key to inclusive developpment.
In my capacity of Director, besides providing my own expertise, I make sure that Nikièma Consults engages in strategic partnerships with organisations or individual experts to contribute together to capacity development that is needed for individual, organisations and institutions in the field of education and training.
Support can be given to a variety of organisations, including organisations for Higher education and TVET, ministries, national commissions, and non-governmental organisations (NGOs) as long as they are instrumental for capacity development in education and training.
Nikièma Consults offers tailored support adapted to the specific capacity needs of the requesting organisations, whether these needs are simple or complex or require either short-term or long-term interventions to tackle them.
As a linking-pin between Dutch education institutes and organisations overseas, I use my knowledge, experience, and network to foster sustainable strengthening of education and training in emerging countries, thus contributing to socio-economic development and the reduction of poverty towards the attainment of inclusive societies.', 'title': 'Director', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 5114311, 'name': 'CINOP Global', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGljnx8EiBE5g/company-logo_400_400/0/1538078035638?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=x7dmpgAahL0RMZ89rT9xd9WFuu6CCHrc7vHgmlOFGsw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cinop-global/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': "'s Hertogenbosch", 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'CINOP Global', 'description': 'CINOP Global is an international consultancy agency focusing on improving TVET / professional education, especially in developing countries and countries in transition.
